measured_by: model-based weight parameter (derived from the Sequential Decision-Making Task’s reinforcement-learning model)
justification: "In our analyses, we focused on the model-based weight parameter that reflects the degree to which choices are guided by model-based decision making."

measured_by: model-free weight parameter (derived from the Sequential Decision-Making Task’s reinforcement-learning model)
justification: The authors state that they "used a sequential decision-making task ... to determine reliance on model-free and model-based decision making," and model-free weights from the same RL model quantify the former.

measured_by: difference in model-based weight between high- and low-stakes trials in the Sequential Decision-Making Task
justification: "Across all participants, we found increased model-based weights for high-stakes trials compared to low-stakes trials ... this indicates that participants showed stakes-based metacontrol."
